verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump 's Department of Homeland Security] [V: announced] [ARG1: an additional 15,000 visas for a federal seasonal work program] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] [ARGM-TMP: after previous changes to the program put American businesses at risk , particularly in a Trump - voting crab town] .

President Donald Trump 's Department of Homeland Security announced an additional 15,000 visas for a federal seasonal work program on Friday after [ARG0: previous changes to the program] [V: put] [ARG1: American businesses] [ARG2: at risk] , [ARGM-LOC: particularly in a Trump - voting crab town] .
